## getGrafanaLiveSrv variable

### getGrafanaLiveSrv variable

Used to retrieve the GrafanaLiveSrv that allows you to subscribe to server side events and streams

-- experimental

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
getGrafanaLiveSrv: () => GrafanaLiveSrv
```
<b>Import</b>

```typescript
import { getGrafanaLiveSrv } from '@grafana/runtime';
```
